description: Data was compiled from the original publications used in the Mitelman database. Various fields of data were assigned a unique code to be used as a reference in other database tables.

fields.description: Code number which depends on the KodTyp
fields.name: Kod

fields.description: This field indicates the type of the code -- there are 7 types: 'MORPH' (morphology), 'GEO' (geography), 'TOP' (topography), 'HER' (heredity), 'TISSUE', 'TREAT' (treatment), and 'RACE
fields.name: KodTyp

fields.description: Whether or not the code is active. "J" is "yes" and "N" is no.this code is active -- almost always 'J' (yes), but is 'N' once and blank once
fields.name: Aktiv

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the code is internal
fields.name: Intern

fields.description: The 'long' name corresponding to this code, eg 'Vascular and perivascular tumors (all subtypes)'
fields.name: Benamning
